name: suitecrm-cobol-bridge
description: SuiteCRM COBOL Bridge - Comprehensive Test Suite

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:security
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:api && npm run test:unit:react && npm run test:unit:php && npm run test:unit:cloud
scripts.test:unit:react: cd business-rules && npm test -- --watchAll=false && cd ../monitoring && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:unit && npm run coverage:merge
scripts.coverage:merge: nyc merge coverage coverage/merged.json && nyc report --reporter=html --reporter=text
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php
scripts.lint:js: eslint api-gateway business-rules cloud-burst monitoring tests --ext .js,.jsx
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:php
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:react
scripts.build:react: cd business-rules && npm run build && cd ../monitoring && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:test
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules api-gateway/node_modules business-rules/node_modules cloud-burst/node_modules monitoring/node_modules
scripts.deps:install: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../business-rules && npm install && cd ../cloud-burst && npm install && cd ../monitoring && npm install && cd ../suitecrm-integration && composer install
scripts.deps:update: npm update && cd api-gateway && npm update && cd ../business-rules && npm update && cd ../cloud-burst && npm update && cd ../monitoring && npm update && cd ../suitecrm-integration && composer update
scripts.setup: npm run deps:install && npm run build:cobol && npm run migrate
scripts.docs: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:php
scripts.security:scan: npm audit && cd suitecrm-integration && composer audit
scripts.health:check: npm run health:api && npm run health:cobol
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run build && npm run security:scan
scripts.ci: npm run setup && npm run test:coverage && npm run security:scan

author: SuiteCRM COBOL Bridge Team
